# Kaveesh Senevirathne — Portfolio

> Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer | Cloud & AI Enthusiast

## About
Kaveesh Senevirathne is a Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience building scalable web applications, cloud microservices, and AI-integrated solutions. Currently working remotely with SeekaHost (UK) and ClickDo (UK). Based in Galle, Sri Lanka.

## Key Projects
